channel.title: Personal on alextrandafir blog
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on alextrandafir blog

item.title: About me
item.description: Alexandru Trandafir -- I'm a software developer based in Bucharest, Romania. I started this “blog” with no exact plan on where to go with it. I plan writing not just about development, but about any subject that interests me. You can find me via email or on linkedin Opinions are my own. Tools I use for this blog: https://gohugo.io/ - this blog is powered by Hugo https://excalidraw.com/ - “hand” drawn diagrams http://wordpress.

item.title: Make a fool out of yourself!
item.description: This is the thing that has always stood in the way for me. I've always looked at people I admired and questioned myself: why can't I do that? They seem so professional and confident. I would look like a fool compared to them. Then I started realising that, if I were to look back at that person (s)he was, at some point, a beginner. Any subject will eventually get complicated once you deep dive into it.
